org.mitre.openid.connect.web

Class RequestObjectAuthorizationEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.openid.connect.web.RequestObjectAuthorizationEndpoint

  • @Controller(value="requestObjectAuthorzationEndpoint")
public class RequestObjectAuthorizationEndpoint
extends Object
    This @Controller is a hack to get around SECOAUTH's AuthorizationEndpoint requiring the response_type parameter to be passed in.
    Author:
    jricher
